ClassDesc: Constants for supporting remote inputs through starting an http:##developer#android#com@B_android#content#Intent_E@. The following example prompts the user to provide input for one RemoteInput by starting an input activity. The intent returned via http:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#Activity#onActivityResult_E@ will contain the input results if collected. To access these results, use the http:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#RemoteInput#getResultsFromIntent_E@ function. The result values will present under the result key passed to the http:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#RemoteInput#Builder_E@ constructor.
